logo.name: AutoFix Logo

sections.title: Welcome to AutoFix Garage
sections.subtitle: Your One-Stop Solution for Car Care
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: At **AutoFix Garage**, we ensure that your car receives the best service available, leaving it running as smoothly as the day you bought it. Let's drive into the future of car maintenance together.

images.name: Garage Interior
images.description: A wide shot of a pristine, modern car garage with state-of-the-art equipment.

sections.title: About AutoFix Garage
sections.subtitle: A Legacy of Excellence
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At **AutoFix Garage**, we've been passionately serving car owners since 1990. Our mission is simple: to provide top-notch automotive services with honesty and expertise. Whether it’s maintenance, repair, or upgrades, our team of certified professionals is here to ensure your vehicle performs at its best.

images.name: Garage Exterior
images.description: The exterior view of AutoFix Garage showcasing our branding and spacious facility.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive Car Care
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
We offer a full range of services tailored to meet your automotive needs. **Our core services include:**

- **Routine Maintenance**: Oil changes, tire rotations, fluid checks, and more.
- **Repairs**: Engine diagnostics, brake repairs, transmission service.
- **Customizations**: Bodywork, performance upgrades, window tinting.
- **Safety Checks**: Pre-trip inspections, insurance assessments.

*Experience the convenience of quality service with a personal touch.*

images.name: Service Bay
images.description: A detailed view of our service bay, equipped with modern tools and professional technicians.

sections.title: See Our Work
sections.subtitle: Quality You Can Trust
sections.name: gallery
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content: Explore some of our latest projects and witness the transformation that quality care can bring to your vehicle.

images.name: Refurbished Classics
images.description: A series of classic cars restored to their former glory.

images.name: Performance Upgrades
